price: De ki: “Gerçekten beni Allah’ın (azabına) karşı hiç kimse asla koruyamaz ve yine asla O’ndan başka sığınacak kimse de bulamam.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٞ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul innī lan yujīranī mina al-lahi aḥadun walan ajida min dūnihi mul'taḥadan
